column4: did anyone else got dissapered sound after update on 10.0.4 , i see all devices when i run sudo aplay -l but they not showing up in soundsettings , any clue ?
fully updated here no sound issues at all
Only thing I can suggest is check alsamixer fro a terminal and make sure nothing muted.
prob is it doesnt show up any hardware in sound settings
i can see them tho if i do  sudo aplay -l
if i use without sudo i get no soundcards found
odd I can see mine without sudo
nah i just updated and it dissapered
before you try that try booting with an older kernel
also try deleting the .pulse folder in
